open_spaces_details.open_space_type: Provision for children and young people

description:
Construction of a four-to-six storey building comprising 45 flats
    (22x1-bed, 18x2-bed, 5x3-bed), together with associated hard and soft landscaping, car parking and alterations to existing public parking   arrangements, a cycle stores and a detached refuse store. (Amendments to the pedestrian route, parking layout and refuse store)
